long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to talk about what you just read on a page? Click boca and join the latest conversation. 

No need for an account or any setup. Be kind and respectful. 

At the moment conversations eventually expire. They are also truncated when they grow too long. 

You can jump in on any topic that you can think of by going to https://bocado.news/boca/{enter_your_topic_here} 
For example,  https://bocado.news/boca/wannabefriends

Have fun!
